c74object.name: crucible
c74object.digest: Parses specific key-value pairs from a dictionary.
c74object.description: The `crucible` object is designed to extract specific pieces of information from a Max dictionary. It takes the name of a dictionary as an argument and, upon receiving a `bang` or a `dictionary` message, it looks up the specified dictionary and sends out the values associated with the keys `palette`, `bar`, and `span`.

arg.name: dictionary-name
arg.digest: The name of the dictionary to reference.
arg.description: The initial argument sets the name of the external `dict` object that `crucible` will look for when it receives a `bang`.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.description: When set to 1, a rightmost outlet is created for verbose logging messages, which can be helpful for debugging.

method.name: bang
method.description: When a `bang` is received, the object will look up the dictionary specified by the initial argument and output the relevant data.

method.name: dictionary
method.description: Receives a message in the format `dictionary `, where `` is the name of a `dict` object. This allows for dynamically specifying which dictionary to parse, overriding the initial argument.

inlet.name: in
inlet.description: The main inlet for receiving messages to trigger the object's parsing functionality.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: Outputs the value associated with the `palette` key in the dictionary.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: Outputs the value associated with the `bar` key in the dictionary.

outlet.name: out
outlet.description: Outputs the largest integer value found in the atom array associated with the `span` key in the dictionary.
